item.description:
East Somerville Main Streets presents UNDER THE STARS: INTERNATIONAL MOVIE NIGHTS IN EAST SOMERVILLE. Saturday, September 12th, a hidden parking lot behind an old fire station in East Somerville will be turned once again into a free international cinematic street party! Italian music and food will kick off the party at 6:30, followed by Pane e Tulipani (Bread and Tulips) screened in Italian with English subtitles.

Meet old friends and new neighbors, while having a night at the movies (international style!) under the stars in East Somerville. Free and open to all. Street Party 6:30, Movies 8:00. Saturday, September 12th (rain date Sept. 25th). 165 Broadway Behind the Old Fire Station - 10 minutes walking from Sullivan Square on the Orange Line.
--------------------------------

WHERE: The event is held behind the old fire station at 165 Broadway (Somerville, MA 02145). 165 Broadway is 10 minutes walking from Sullivan Square on the Orange Line.

WHEN: Saturday, September 12th. The street party starts at 6:30 and the movie begins at 8:00. We do not have an official "end time". Rain date: September 26th.

COST: Free and open to all!! There will be vendors selling food on site.

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Luned√¨ Italiano

item.name: International Movie Night in East Somerville - Pane e Tulipani
